WORKPLACE, MANAGEMENT to watch or organize a job or an activity to make certain that it is being done correctly: As marketing manager, her job is to oversee all the company's advertising.
FINANCE, MANAGEMENT to be in charge of how an amount of money is invested or spent: The capital management firm oversees total assets of $107 million. The company CFO will oversee the budget and finances.
POLITICS, LAW to watch an activity to make sure that it is being done correctly and legally: The World Trade Organization oversees the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank.
